dmca.title: Defamation Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
On behalf of my client Mrs. Luisa Corna whose address is right now considered at the law firm of Polimeni & Cotroneo in Rome, [redacted], for the purpose of present request.

I mean the following:
Within the database of the search engine google.it and its relative cache there is the page which is indexed with the following url

http://italy.indymedia.org/news/2004/06/572089_comment.php

Inside that page highly defamatory contents linked to my cilent were found. The integrated defamatory contents are subject to the application of art. 595 of the Italian Penal code and undoubtedly punishable by law.
The attributed contents to my well known Italian client, events, actions and behaviors are absolutely not true and consequently defamatory.

According to all above, it is required the acknowledgement of the iIIicit act. And it is also required a rapid removal of such content from the database of your search engine and it should not go beyond 7 days starting from receiving the present letter. Otherwise Mrs. Corna will be forced to sue and the
same company will be considered responsible according to the ltalian law (Art 16 D. Lgs. 70j2003). I am so looking forward to having your abrupt feedback at soonest.

Best regards
[redacted]
